text: By the way, I know that knights and mages don't normally give away their names...
But I want to give you a proper greeting!
You told me that I'm not like other knights.
Now I'm telling you that you're not like other mages.
You teamed up with me, tailored these loops for me, and even said sorry!
You're way better! That's why I want to give you a proper greeting!
My name is Aegis, the Loop Mage. A pleasure to meet you.
My name is Daffodil, the Axe Knight. Nice to meetcha!
